mapper.select: SELECT a.userId, a.userPasswd, a.statusCD, a.deptCD, a.deptName, a.empKey, a.userFstName, a.userLstName, a.jisaCD, a.userType, a.userLevel, a.encodeCookie, b.stateCD FROM globalbiz.Users AS a LEFT JOIN globalbiz.ViewsDeptMstAct AS b ON a.deptCD = b.deptCD WHERE a.userId = #{memberId} AND a.statusCD = '1'
mapper.update: UPDATE globalbiz.Users SET encodeCookie = #{encodeCookie} WHERE userId = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT count(userId) FROM globalbiz.Users WHERE userId = #{memberId} AND encodeCookie = #{encodeCookie}
